text: Aerospace Valley is a French group of aerospace engineering companies and research centres. It is in the regions of Occitanie and Nouvelle- AquitaineAerospace Vallée. Décollage imminent in the southwest of France and is mainly concentrated in and around the city of Toulouse. There are over 500 companies, including Airbus, Dassault Aviation, EADS and Air France Industries.Economie. Aerospace Valley à l'âge de la maturité About 120,000 people work there in the aviation and space flight industries.AEROSPACE VALLEY ANNONCE SA STRATÉGIE The headquarters of Aerospace Valley is in Toulouse.
